answers.answer: Yes, you should see a dermatologist and get treatment.  Wounds that don't heal leave you open to infection and can cause a variety of problems.  Do you have other wounds that take a long time to heal?  Are you thirsty or do you pee often?  If you do, you should get tested for diabetes.  good luck

question: HI, ive had this sore on my middle finger for a very long time, probally since 5th grade (im in 10th now) and it simply will not heal.Its a scab sort of wound that cracks open and ouzes pretty often.I talked to my doctor a few years ago and he said it was just a wart, i tried a perscription wart remover and it did nothing,is this something serious that i need to see a dermatologist about?thanks-drummer
title: Sore that wolnt heal
